author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Convert the algorithm DDHGCalTBModule used for test beam application to DD4Hep

#### PR validation:

Use the cfg files in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python to test the new algorithm

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hgx220 Convert DDHGCalTBModule algorithm for DD4Hep
